m: Hello there. We’ve been expecting you.
What is going on here?
You have found a way out of the illusion of time. Now you are witness for your race.
This can’t be real. How are you doing this?
Please leave me alone.
Who are you?
You cannot get away from your own shadow.
But it is. This is occurring through means far beyond your Y2K world.
But how do I know that any of this is real?
Here’s a start. This man, Layne Thompson.
Ah there you are. Enjoying yourself?

Alright stop this crap. What the hell is going on? I demand you! You think this is a game? A joke? Just a story? You think you’re so powerful? So clever? These are government matters here! You won’t be able to get away with this! They will track you down.

Oh that’s good. Don’t flatter yourself or your government too much, they’re not nearly as adept as they lead their citizens to believe. Just as it is written, Hubris truly is a deadly sin. Always remember that.
I could say the same of you.
Can you at least skip the biblical?
What do you want? What do you want me to do?
Haha you are too funny. Or maybe you are even more naive than I assumed. You think you see, but your true eye has not been opened. The Sight will come.
Funny. Or maybe you are even more naive than I assumed. You think you see, but your true eye has not been opened. The Sight will come.
I want you to understand. To find knowledge and truth. There are many who are mislead, who only see what they want to, but not the world as it truly is.
Okay, so how do I find this sight?
Search here and within yourself. You might find that they’re not very different.
Well look at you! You’ve almost discovered the buried treasure! X Marks the spot!
Enough! Am I really switching between times periods? 2037? How is that possible?!

I’ve told you time and time again these are matters far beyond your understanding and technological capabilities of 1999. They are far beyond those of 2037 as well. They are so far beyond that they transcend technology. They are essentially organic.
Seriously, enough with the pseudo-mystical shit. I am here to find who killed Ray Morgan and thats it! I don’t want to get dragged into this rabbit hole any further.
That is what I am here to show you. Anyway isn’t it obvious already?
I don't want to believe it.
I don't believe it.
So it's all true.
Good. Never blindly accept until you can put your hand into the wound. Are you ready to do so?

Good. That’s a virtue. The skeptic is the one who wins in the end. Never blindly accept until you can put your hand into the wound. Yet I at least need you to have faith in yourself moving forward. Can you have that?
Reality is not just stranger than we imagine. Its stranger than we can imagine. You’re ready to take the plunge?
Yes.
No.
Yes, let's get this over with.
No.
Well I hope, for your sake, that you are strong.
Hmm.... Too bad.
